item.title: Graphics and rendering tips from Survival Kids
item.description: ð This summer, Unity launched the co-op game “Survival Kids,” developed in-house with a small team. With limited resources, they focused on innovative graphics and rendering techniques. ð Using the Universal Render Pipeline, they balanced artistic goals with performance needs. Custom shaders and dynamic lighting were key to achieving their visual style. ð The ocean rendering was inspired by existing projects, utilizing signed distance fields for unique effects.
